ygData.subject: Re: Not appropriate
ygData.msgSnippet: I totally agree with you Olczyk. I awoke today to find 55 new mesages in my mail and not even 1/4 of them are what this is suppose to be used for. If you have
ygData.messageBody:
I totally agree with you Olczyk. I awoke today to find 55 new mesages
in my mail and not even 1/4 of them are what this is suppose to be
used for. If you have a problem with someones guild or how they are
playing the game Stop following them around and do what you want.
This is meant to be fun and some people want to do it differently
then others. Hell if there is a guild out there that i really like
and have fun with i could care less about paying 100 pp to get into
it. This is what you make of it. I am a 14th lvl Bard and currently
working on blacksmithing in my free time. I am doing this to get the
prized armor and hopefully make alot of loot. But i do plan on
starting a guild and probly will charge ??(alot) to get into it. The
reason being is that i will make banded for anyone in my guild at
cost. Does that sound like a bad thing?? Just curious why so many
people complain about pp's to join guilds.

Also for some of you having problems finding some of the songs,(i
wont say which ones cause i dont like to spoil anything in this game
for anyone else) there are some songs on a merchant inside the
Highhold. This is quite a trip for some of you but well worth it. The
views are wonderful from the hold.

In and around the beautiful city of Qeynos(sonyeq)is where I frequent
and if any bards would like to trade stories or just go out and
adventure or even need some help with a problem, give me a shout.

Most importantly HAVE FUN

Happy Hunting

Maraxus of Qeynos


>From: kleit@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Not appropriate
>Date: 26 Apr 1999 13:57:06 -0000
>
>From: kleit@...
>
>While i am not a member of the soerbaird nor have i ever met a
member, i still think that the opinions put forth ford and greg are
not fit to print. this is an information source not a general gripe
board. please let the rest of us make up out minds about people when
we meet them. i am a journalist in that other realm known as earth
and what you wrote would there be called libel. please be civil my
brothers. we are all here to have fun.
>Olczyk of Qeynos
>tarew marr
>
